mapper.sql: line.id as id , line.areaId as areaId , line.content as content, province.name as province
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_areabatch_line line LEFT JOIN gk_province province ON province.id=line.areaId
and id in (#{condition.whereSql})
${condition.groupOp} ${condition.lineareaId.field} ${condition.lineareaId.op} #{condition.lineareaId.data}
${condition.groupOp} (province.name like #{condition.queryparam.data} OR line.content like #{condition.queryparam.data})
ORDER BY id DESC
limit ${offset}, ${rows}
